caption: A solider is fighting in a war. Suddenly, he wakes up and realizes it’s a dream. Then he sits on the bed for a while, until he opens his laptop and begins to write blogs. He goes to see a doctor, and they have a conversation. They both sit on the sofa, and the man seems really depressed and painful. Then he goes for a walk with his crush, he has difficulties walking, And during that, he meet a fat man greeting him. Maybe they are old friends.  He stops and start to talking with the fat man.
